title: Casbah (1948 Drama) Den of a thousand thieves ! Rendezvous for romance !

sources.title: Casbah (1948 Drama) Den of a thousand thieves ! Rendezvous for romance !
sources.description:
In the labyrinthine alleys of Algiers' Casbah, master thief Pépé le Moko (Tony Martin) orchestrates daring heists while evading capture. His world unravels when he becomes captivated by the elegant Gaby (Märta Torén), leading him into a perilous game with cunning detective Slimane (Peter Lorre) and igniting jealousy in his devoted partner, Inez (Yvonne De Carlo).

Original title: Casbah (1948)

Director: John Berry
Writers: Leslie Bush-Fekete, Arnold Manoff, Erik Charell

Main cast:
Tony Martin – Pépé Le Moko
Yvonne De Carlo – Inez
Peter Lorre – Slimane
Märta Torén – Gaby
Eartha Kitt – Dancer (her very first on film performance)

Genres: Crime, Drama, Musical, Romance
Release date: April 1, 1948
Filming location: Hollywood, USA

See also related film: Algiers (1938) https://youtu.be/iXEI8AiyhSA


https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA
